Gift to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Thomas E. Leavey, director general of the Universal Postal Union, on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by the director general.
